html:
9.23.18  10:37 pm   how do you manage to finish a video in 2 weeks

     i'm not sure but i'm doing it anyway

9.23.18  10:34 pm   what is your favorite natural sound? I personally like rain the best

     the sound ATMs make when they dispense the money

9.23.18  10:33 pm   remedies for becoming not tired?

     sleep?

9.23.18  9:27 pm   it's ok to be neutral sometimes?

     maybe

9.23.18  9:02 pm   how do you make yourself believe fake deadlines? by fake i mean self-imposed. I try to do that to stop myself from procrastinating, but the panic motivation sees through the lies and won't let me get anything done.

     if you get desperate enough it will work

9.23.18  8:26 pm   Do you have due dates for your videos?

     yes

      Or do you work at your own pace?

     i always work as fast as possible

9.23.18  7:55 pm   why try to be reasonable? what's the point?

     having a point

9.23.18  7:42 pm   If you don't consider yourself a guitarist than how are you playing one in "hallelujah"?

     that's just for 1 riff

9.23.18  6:30 pm   Do you have any tips on finding a balance between singing with emotion, and with techniques? I always focus on one or the other, which makes my voice less stable

     try to solve all of the life problems you've ever had and ever will have, using only singing

9.23.18  5:13 pm   Does time exist?

     yes

      If not, how do I know the difference between the beginning and ending of your songs?

9.23.18  4:56 pm   whats a glockenspiel

     like an entire keyboard full of bells

9.23.18  4:16 pm   how's the song coming along?

     good

      is it one of the recent group or from a prior session?

     just wrote it

      the zilliness is just so ooooohhhhhhhhhh

9.23.18  3:59 pm   Do you play any instruments

     yes

9.23.18  3:47 pm   hey bill, what made you pick this kind of music?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

       how do you build your chord progressions?

     i have to just find what causes the song overall to give me the special feeling

9.23.18  3:45 pm   i know it's been like a year since you've heard california but is the secret fuck in the alabama verse

     i believe so

9.23.18  3:07 pm   do you have a favourite fable

      the big bang

9.23.18  2:55 pm   are you Mt St Helens?

     i played that role last week

9.23.18  2:39 pm   i love the sound where you move the headphones 1 inch away from your ears. is there some way i can replicate that sound via computors?

     unplug the headphones from your laptop, smart phone, or tablet

9.23.18  1:53 pm   does getting good songs out there still make you feel like a million bucks?

     yes

9.23.18  1:38 pm   How do you stay productive?

     if you win the first hour of the day you win the day

9.23.18  1:34 pm   any tips for playing tasty bass fills?

     take care of the song. if you take care of the song, anything else you do will automatically be tasty

9.23.18  1:32 pm   what is your opinion on mario (and his green variant)

     he is mickey mouse

9.23.18  1:01 pm   Hmm, would there ever be another shorty short or MOAR SONGS!?!! MMM!!! Because everyone craves for one.

     songs every 2 weeks, with video included

9.23.18  12:45 pm   would you do another reality video?

     there are hundreds and thousands left to do

9.23.18  12:32 pm   what did you name the child you had with the alien?

     i thought that story was about you

9.23.18  12:27 pm   minor 7 or maj(add6)

     neither, i hear nothing. did u forget the attachment

9.23.18  12:00 pm   Why we don t say hellow instead of hello? Is more clear to be like this.

      that's true but 'hello' is more fun for the thrill of confusing people

9.23.18  11:59 am   Do your lyrics have some hidden meaning,

     it depends whether you can see it

      or are they meant to be taken literally?

     you could try it that way

9.23.18  11:24 am   How do I know if something is relatable or else?

     it is

9.23.18  11:18 am   What happenned to the blimp, and where is it now?

     all blimps are still in the sky unless they crash. it is not possible to land a blimp

9.23.18  8:49 am   How should I spend my day?

     you could bake a cake. maybe double bake it if you have time

9.23.18  8:48 am   Has anything gone wrong?

     yes but it's ok

9.23.18  6:44 am   What in the song writing process takes you the longest?

     the part where i write the other 90% of the song besides the part that i first came up with. this is because the 90% is longer and contains more content than the 10%

9.23.18  6:39 am   how to are lasers

      pretty good

9.23.18  5:09 am   were you actually in the middle of a bed bath and beyond when you did that improv lessons video

     absolutely not

      and if so how did people react

9.23.18  5:22 am   What is your fetish?

     being normal

9.23.18  3:05 am   Whats the future like?

     could be pretty good

9.23.18  2:52 am   In a lot of your songs, you mention wanting/not wanting to go back home.

     i guess it just feels good in a song but i am proud to announce that i have attended re-hab for it and will not be using that phrase again in the foreseeable future

      Have you been homesick?

      home and sick but not both

9.23.18  2:51 am   do you ask yourself questions?

     oh hell yeah

9.23.18  2:20 am   is it possible to achieve your dreams without destroying your life in the process?

     you might be able to do it while only destroying your life just a little

9.23.18  2:17 am   Is Microsoft Paint easy to use?

     never used it

9.23.18  12:48 am   what is your favorite thing, out of all of the things

     oh i'm not falling for that one again. it always changes after i choose

9.23.18  12:47 am   What do you enjoy the most

     things changing, things staying the same, and things changing between changing and staying the same

9.23.18  12:31 am   contrary to other people, you are quite approachable compared to other artists similar to your recognition. what factors do you think cause that?

     approachable is my middle name

9.23.18  12:29 am   why do you not use captial letters, bill "meaning" wurtz?9.21.18  7:42 pm

     PERHAPS YOU COULD ASK YOURSELF THAT

9.23.18  12:07 am   Why can't my friend hear that I'm playing a G/B chord instead of a Bm chord?

     this is to increase your self esteem but also give you an increasing feeling of emotional isolation

9.22.18  11:12 pm   So my neighbors keep blasting loud, annoying bagpipe music from their house. What should I do about it? 

     become stronger

9.22.18  11:10 pm   What's the biggest scam? 

     lying

9.22.18  10:32 pm   Should you assume that your reader has read Hamlet?

     no

9.22.18  10:31 pm   Why does do you ask yourself questions here lead to https://billwurtz.com/questions/no0.html?

     because that is the answer to that question
